data.message: I believe that every job is important, no matter how big or small. When I go to a restaurant, I tell the person that are cleaning tables that their job is very important. Who wants to set at a dirty table. Be the best at whatever job that you have.

replies.message: I agree! Hey my uncle was a janitor for our school! He worked 40 years there! He owned his own home, car, paid bills, bought food and clothing for five kids! Put all three through college! Bought them all their first car! This was from 1929-1970! And he left a sizeable bank account! The man could squeeze old Washington until he cried uncle!
My grandpa always said "if it is worth doing at all, it is worth doing right".
Agreed Jody! Every job has dignity.
Martin Luther King jr. “If a street sweeper is what you are, then take pride in what you do and be the best street sweeper that you can be”.
Can you let the kid have his moment. Had he not posted, you would have not posted, so it shows how much your statements are on your mind.
